page.title: 14CHILDRENS GAMES-AUCHINLECK
page.content: The children play a variety of games some depending on the time of the year. {Hide and Seek.}One person(the seeker) counts up to a certain number as the other children run away and hide.The object of the game is for the person counting to find the other children and return to base to count them out. First person caught is then 'het' i.e. the seeker. {Skipping.}Skipping with a rope can be played alone, but is often played by a group.Two people are 'enders'and 'ca'(swing) the rope while the others take it in turns to skip. This is done to a variety of rhymes and songs. {Tig.}This game involves one child who is 'het' chasing the other children .When he touches one then that child is 'het'i.e.the chaser.
